net.cloud.server.game.action

Interface ActionHandler<A extends ActionEnum>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - Type of the action ID
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ButtonActionHandler

    public interface ActionHandler<A extends ActionEnum>
    An interface more for symmetry than anything. All ActionHandlers will be stored separate, since their handle methods may well have different signatures, and that's just fine. However, all handlers will need to be able to load the actions they take care of, so that's here.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loadAction(PrintWriter out, GroovyObjectLoader loader, A id)
      Load only a single action this handler is responsible for.
      void loadAllActions(PrintWriter out, GroovyObjectLoader loader)
      Load all of the actions the handler is responsible for.

    • Method Detail

      • loadAllActions

        void loadAllActions(PrintWriter out,
                    GroovyObjectLoader loader)
             throws Exception
        Load all of the actions the handler is responsible for. This will re-load them if they have already been loaded. This will continue even if a single action fails to load, instead concatenating the exception messages and throwing one at the end of loading.
        Parameters:
        out - A PrintWriter to write output progress messages to
        loader - Used to obtain instances of the actions
        Throws:
        Exception - If one or more of the actions could not be loaded

      • loadAction

        void loadAction(PrintWriter out,
                GroovyObjectLoader loader,
                A id)
         throws Exception
        Load only a single action this handler is responsible for. If it has already been loaded, then it will be reloaded.
        Parameters:
        out - A PrintWriter to write output progress messages to
        loader - Used to obtain instances of the actions
        id - The ID of the action to load
        Throws:
        Exception - If the action could not be loaded for some reason
